com.ITE

Class StorageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ITE.StorageConverter

  • public class StorageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contain all the method that can be use to convert number of storage converter.

      • calledStorageConverter

        void calledStorageConverter(int menuOption,
                            int converter)
        This function is use to call each converter method from StorageConverter class to use in main class. Menu Option:
        1. Byte
        2. KiloByte
        3. MegaByte
        4. GigaByte
        5. TeraByte
        6. PetaByte
        Parameters:
        menuOption - is an user choice from 1 to 6
        converter - is an specific converter option (number represented shown in menu)

      • storageConverterSubMenu

        void storageConverterSubMenu(int option)
        This storageConverterSubMenu have ability to find option that Match it then display its sub Menu.
        Parameters:
        option - is user option that pass from CreateMenu() in case 4.

      • Byte

        private void Byte(int convertOption)
        This Byte Method group all byte Converter. Option:
        1. Byte to Kilobyte
        2. Byte to Megabyte
        3. Byte to Gigabyte
        4. Byte to Terabyte
        5. Byte to Petabyte
        Parameters:
        convertOption - take option as integer.

      • Kilobyte

        private void Kilobyte(int convertOption)
        This Kilobyte Method group all Kilobyte Converter. Option:
        1. KiloByte to Byte
        2. KiloByte to Megabyte
        3. KiloByte to Gigabyte
        4. KiloByte to Terabyte
        5. KiloByte to Petabyte
        Parameters:
        convertOption - take option as integer.
